comments: Sum of n-th row = 2*A001629(n+1). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 07 2012
references: L. Carlitz, A Fibonacci array, Fib. Quart. 1(#2) (1963), 217-28.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..120 of triangle, flattened
prog: (Haskell)a039913 n k = a039913_tabl !! n !! ka039913_row n = a039913_tabl !! na039913_tabl = [[0], [1, 1]] ++ f [0] [1, 1] where   f us@(u:us') vs@(v:vs') = ws : f vs ws where     ws = [u + v, u + v + v] ++ zipWith (+) us vs'-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 07 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 28 2000
